title: Learn with Isaac
text:
This is my growing collection of lessons, notes, and explorations in data science, machine learning, and deep learning.

📘 These notes are part personal study guide, part public resource — feel free to browse, share, or build upon them.




📚 Navigate the full list of lessons from the sidebar or jump into one of the sections below:



Exploratory Data Analysis
Hypothesis Testing





Intro to Neural Networks
Gradient Descent






I created this site to:

Clarify concepts by writing them out
Track my own progress through structured topics
Share insights and resources with anyone interested in learning






📈 Statistical learning fundamentals
🤖 NLP and transformers
⚙️ MLOps and reproducibility
🔍 Real-world projects and case studies





Got ideas, suggestions, or corrections? Reach out on GitHub or open an issue!
